Instance.description: Situation Goal for actor running an interaction for a certain amount of time.

TunableTuple.name: _goal_test
TunableTuple.description: Interaction and duration that this situation goal will use. Example: Bartend for 10 sim minutes.

Tunable.name: affordance
Tunable.description: The affordance that we are are timing for length of runtime.

Tunable.name: duration
Tunable.description: The amount of time in sim hours that this interaction has to run for this test to be considered passed.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: A set of tags that will match an affordance instead of looking for a specific one.

Tunable.name: verify_sims_interested_in_goal
Tunable.description: Whether or not event verification should check that the Sim Info for an event is part of the list of Sims that are associated with the goal. For example, a goal to garden for an hour would use this to make sure that only the household Sims are considered. NOTE: If this becomes widely used by time-based goals, we should consider making this the standard default behaviour instead of being opt-in.
